definition: forced labor/corvée/obligatory task/military service/to use as servant/to enserf/servant (old)/war/campaign/battle

sentences.english: Female citizens may be recruited for active service according to the army's need in accordance with the preceding paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 根據軍隊需要，可以按前款規定徵集女性公民服現役。

sentences.english: No active fighter can come close to equaling De La Hoya's name recognition and earning power.
sentences.chinese: 沒有一個現役拳手能夠媲美霍亞的名聲和票房。

sentences.english: Create a care package and send it to an active duty military unit.
sentences.chinese: 製作一個急救包並且送給現役部隊。

sentences.english: Many of the soldiers are still doing their compulsory national service.
sentences.chinese: 作證的士兵大多是現役軍人。

sentences.english: It may be possible to cut personnel costs by shifting some active-duty troops to the reserves temporarily, she said.
sentences.chinese: 她說，可能會通過將現役軍人轉爲預備役來削減兵員。

sentences.english: He enlisted for active service in the war.
sentences.chinese: 他在戰爭中入伍服現役。

sentences.english: For an Active Duty Soldier, length of service can range from two to six years.
sentences.chinese: 對於現役軍人來說，服役期爲二至六年。

sentences.english: Some old destroyers in the fleet are ready to be pensioned off.
sentences.chinese: 艦隊裏有幾艘舊驅逐艦就要退出現役了。

sentences.english: Gamers can also unlock current NBA players to create unique match-ups between legends and current stars.
sentences.chinese: 你還能挑選現役球員和傳奇球星們組隊進行比賽。

sentences.english: The results accord with the existing burner design values.
sentences.chinese: 數值計算結果與現役燃燒爐設計值吻合很好。

sentences.english: In terms of the army there are now some 80000 effectives.
sentences.chinese: 陸軍現在大約有八萬現役軍人。

sentences.english: To all who serve, it has been the honor of my lifetime to be your Commander-in-Chief.
sentences.chinese: 我們的現役軍官，成爲你們的總司令是我一生的榮幸。

sentences.english: The service system for servicemen and for reservists shall be prescribed by law.
sentences.chinese: 現役軍人和預備役人員的服役制度由法律規定。

sentences.english: The Postal Service and uniformed military personnel are not included in the data.
sentences.chinese: 郵政機構和現役軍人的數據沒有包含在內。

sentences.english: Active-duty officers can retire after 20 years of service.
sentences.chinese: 現役軍官服役滿20年即可退休。

sentences.english: A system of active service for different terms shall be instituted for volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 志願兵實行分期服現役制度。

definition: (sports) member of the national team/national representative/(medicine, chess etc) one of the most highly skilled practitioners in one's country
to go to war/to engage in war
to stay/to remain/to linger/(computing) to reside/resident (program etc)
to wait to fill a vacancy/reserve (candidate)/alternate/substitute
to call for entries and select the best/to solicit (entries, submissions, applications etc)/to select (the best candidate)/contest/competition
